newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-BORUSSIA DORTMUND V MANCHESTER UNITED TEAMS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BORUSSIA DORTMUND V MANCHESTER UNITED TEAMS.

text.p: Manchester United made a late change to their team for their European Cup semifinal, first leg against Borussia Dortmund of Germany on Wednesday.
Just minutes before the kickoff coach Alex Ferguson replaced goalkeeper Peter Schmeichel with Dutchman Raimond van der Gouw. Schmeichel is believed to have failed a late fitness test.

Borussia Dortmund - 1-Stefan Klos, 7-Stefan Reuter, 16-Martin Kree, 20-Wolfgang Feiersinger, 17-Joerg Heinrich, 18-Lars Ricken, 19-Paulo Sousa, 10-Andy Moeller, 14-Paul Lambert, 11-Heiko Herrlich, 23-Rene Tretschok.

Manchester United - 17-Raimond van der Gouw, 3-Denis Irwin, 6-Gary Pallister, 2-Gary Neville, 5-Ronny Johnsen, 16-Roy Keane, 8-Nicky Butt, 10-David Beckham, 11-Ryan Giggs, 7-Eric Cantona, 20-Ole-Gunnar Solksjaer.
